/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street below is teeming with life, filled with cars and buses navigating their way through the urban jungle. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the sides of the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. In the distance, a large storm cloud looms, its ominous presence contrasting with the otherwise serene sky.
